articles.author: Sharjah 24
articles.title: Messi magic guides relieved Argentina past Mexico - Sharjah24
articles.description: Sharjah24 – Reuters: Sublime strikes by Lionel Messi and Enzo Fernandez earned Argentina a 2-0 win over feisty Mexico in a pulsating atmosphere at the Lusail Stadium on Saturday and got the South American favourites' World Cup campaign up and running.
articles.content: Stunned 2-1 by Saudi Arabia in their opening Group C match, Argentina knew defeat would send them out of the tournament but they started poorly, struggling to cope with Mexico's high press as Messi w… [+675 chars]
